questions.question: Which of the following is a weak base?

explanations.c: HF is actually a weak acid, not a base
explanations.d: Correct: Ammonium hydroxide (NH₄OH) is a weak base

questions.question: The number of moles of solute dissolved per litre of solution is......

explanations.a: Normality considers equivalents, not just moles
explanations.c: Correct: Molarity is defined as moles of solute per liter of solution
explanations.d: Molality is moles per kilogram of solvent

questions.question: Methyl Orange produces ..........colour in acidic solution

explanations.a: Methyl orange doesn't produce green in any condition
explanations.b: Yellow is the color in basic solution, not acidic
explanations.d: Correct: Methyl orange turns red in acidic solutions
